arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} whenever you deal direct damage while {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}.
